item.title: kubectl command
item.author: Atticus Lv
item.description: kubectl指令 帮助 kubectl --help 查看apiVersion kubectl api-versions 创建pod kubectl create -f [file.yaml] -n [namespace] 应用配置 kubectl apply -f [file.yaml] -n [namespace] 删除资源 kubectl delete -f [file.yaml] -n [namespace] 查看pods kubectl get pods 查看service kubectl get services 查看deployment kubectl get deployments 查看详细信息 (后面加-o wide) kubectl get pods -o wide kubectl get services -o wide kubecetl get deployments -o wide 进入到指定pod kubectl exec -it [pod name] -n [namespace] -- bash # desprecated kubectl exec -it [pod name] bash 查看指定容器log
